shortContent: Spend fate point to regain cohesion equal to Fellowship bonus.
content:
The Battle-Brother exemplifies all that is finest in an Adeptus
Astartes to the extent that his presence can rally his brothers
and inspire them to fight together against overwhelming
odds. The Battle-Brother may spend a Fate Point as a Free
Action to regain Cohesion equal to his Fellowship Bonus. He
may do this once per Round.
